title: Seeds of revolution = Semillas de revolucion
creator_credit: Howard Enders, ABC Television (US) and Howard Enders Productions
brief_description: A documentary about the economic and social injustice in Hondouras. The present co-operation between the military government and the Standard Fruit Company is seen in the historical framework of class oppression and exploitation that may only be able to find its resolution through revolution.
